apps.name: Tails
apps.localizedDescription: Tails is a furry art browser.
apps.versionDescription:
This is the initial release of Tails, containing a set of features to improve the browsing experience over a web browser:
– Infinite Scrolling
– Hi-Res Images
– Local Tag Subscriptions
– WebM Compatibility

Tails also includes support for browsing pools, favoriting and voting on posts, autocompleting search and image downloading to your device.

news.title: A Message from Safo
news.caption: You've installed Tails' AltStore source! 🎉 If you have any questions, I can be reached in Telegram or Twitter by @SafoSnep, and by email at tails@safo.fi.
